member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.AllAccess
member.summary: Specifies all possible access flags for the process object.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.CreateThread
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle in the CreateRemoteThread function to create a thread in the process.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.DuplicateHandle
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle as either the source or target process in the DuplicateHandle function to duplicate a handle.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.QueryInformation
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle in the GetExitCodeProcess and GetPriorityClass functions to read information from the process object.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.SetInformation
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle in the SetPriorityClass function to set the priority class of the process.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.Terminate
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle in the TerminateProcess function to terminate the process.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.VMOperation
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle in the VirtualProtectEx and WriteProcessMemory functions to modify the virtual memory of the process.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.VMRead
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle in the ReadProcessMemory function to' read from the virtual memory of the process.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.VMWrite
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle in the WriteProcessMemory function to write to the virtual memory of the process.

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports.ProcessAccess.Synchronize
member.summary: Enables usage of the process handle in any of the wait functions to wait for the process to terminate.

member.name: T:UOAI2.UOAI.Imports
member.summary: A class to encapsulate imported functions from User32.dll and Kernel32.dll

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.Item.#ctor
member.summary: When using this new, never ever ever try to access the contents!

member.name: F:UOAI2.UOAI.Item.MemoryOffset
member.summary: Where the actual memory offset of the item is stored

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.Item.Serial
member.summary: The serial of the item.

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.Item.Type
member.summary: The artwork number of that item. This is what determines what it looks like in game.

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.Item.StackID
member.summary: The number to add the the artwork number to get the artwork number of the item if it is a stack. Usualy this is 0x01.

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.Item.Amount
member.summary: The number of objects in a stack.

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.Item.X
member.summary: The location of the item on the X axis. If the item is inside of a container, this represents the number of pixels within the container from the left side at which the item will be placed.

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.Item.Y
member.summary: The location of the item on the Y axis. If the item is inside of a container, this represents the number of pixels from the top of the container that the item will be placed

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.Item.Z
member.summary: The location of the item on the Z axis. If the item is inside of a container this specifies the "height" of it, like if its on top of other objects.

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.Item.Container
member.summary: The serial of the container of the item.

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.Item.Hue
member.summary: The item's hue.

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.Item.TypeName
member.summary: Returns a string containing the ASCII name of the item artwork name. Returns "Blank" if no typename can be found.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.Item.Take(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Picks up the object.
member.param: The amount that you want to take, if it is a stack. (0 for the whole stack)

members.member:
Standard UO macros
Hide this class from the user, there is no reason from him/her to see it.

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.PID
member.summary: Gets the windows process ID of the client. This is used as the unique identifier for each client running.
member.value: The windows Process ID of the client.

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.WindowCaption
member.summary: A method used to get the title of the client window as a string.
member.returns: The client window title, generally something like "Ultima Online"

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.Items
member.summary: Returns the client's itemlist.

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.Mobiles
member.summary: Returns a list of the client's mobiles.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.RemoveObject(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Remove an item, mobile, etc... from the collections
member.param: The 32-bit address in the client's memory of the object as

member.name: E:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.onClientExit
member.summary: Called when the client process closes.
member.param: The client that exited, for multi-clienting event handlers in VB.NET

member.name: E:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.onLogin
member.summary: Called when the client recieves a login confirm packets from the game server, and the player character is created.

member.name: E:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.onPacketReceive
member.summary: Called when a Packet arrives on this client.
member.param: Client on which the packet was received
The received packet

member.name: E:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.onPacketSend
member.summary: Called when a Packet is sent formt he client to the server.
member.param: Client from which the packet was sent.
The sent packet.

member.name: E:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.onKeyUp
member.summary: Called when the user of the client releases a pressed key.
member.param: The client on which the key was released
Virtual Key Code of the released key (a list of key codes can be founrd at http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms927178.aspx)

member.name: E:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.onKeyDown
member.summary: Called when the user of the client holds down a key.
member.param: The client on which the key was pressed
Virtual Key Code of the pressed key (a list of key codes can be founrd at http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms927178.aspx)

member.name: E:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.onConnectionLoss
member.summary: Called when the client loses its network connection to the server.
member.param: The client that lost its connection.

member.name: E:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.onClientSpeech
member.summary: Called when the client sends a speech packet to the server.
member.param: The client sending the packet.
The text in the packet.
The font as
The hue of the text.
The language code that applies to the text.
The speech type as

member.name: E:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.onNewMobile
member.summary: Called when a mobile is created and added to the mobile list.
member.param: The client to which this applies.
The new mobile.

member.name: E:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.onNewItem
member.summary: Called after a new item is created and added to the item list.
member.param: The client to which this applies.
The new item.

member.name: E:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.onCliLocSpeech
member.summary: Called when the server sends the client a CliLoc speech packet. This is after the client processes the packet.
member.param: The client to which this applies.
The serial of the mobile/item speaking. 0xFFFFFFFF for System
The bodytype/artwork of the mobile/item speaking. 0xFFFF for System
The type of speech.
The hue of the message.
The font of the message.
The cliloc number.
The name of the speaker. "SYSTEM" for System.
The arguements string, for formatting the speech. Each arguement is seperated by a "\t".

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.SysMsg(System.String)
member.summary: Displays a message in game, on the bottom left corner of the screen.
member.param: The text you want to display.

member.summary: Drops an object into the specified container.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.PatchEncryption
member.summary: Disables the client encryption.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.DropPacket
member.summary: Used from within the onRecievePacket/onPacketSend events to tell UOAI to delete the packet so the client never gets it.

member.summary: Restores the client window.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.Client.Close
member.summary: Kills the client process, which subsequently calls the "onClientExit" event for this client instance.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.ClientList.byPID(System.Int32)
member.summary: Find a UOAI.Client object by its associated Process ID.
member.param: The windows Process ID of the client you want to find.
member.returns: Returns a UOAI.Client, if it finds the correct one it returns that one. Although if it doesn't find one matching the PID it will raise the "onError" event and return the first client in the list.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.ClientList.Add(System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds clients to the Clients arraylist, based on PID
member.param: The process ID of the client you want to add.

member.name: M:UOAI2.UOAI.ClientList.Remove(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removed a client from the clients arraylist, based on PID.
member.param: The process ID of the client you want to remove.

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.ClientList.Count
member.summary: Forces update of client list then returns a count of the clients.
member.returns: An integer value representing the current number of UO clients running.

member.name: P:UOAI2.UOAI.ClientList.Client
member.summary: Returns the UOAI.Client at the specified index.
